description: This file defines Row Level Security (RLS) policies and related security functions for a PostgreSQL database used in a game backend. It specifies access controls for tables such as 'users', 'zones', 'missions', 'notifications', and 'activity_log', ensuring that users can only view or modify data according to their permissions and roles.

methods.name: user_owns_zone
methods.description: Checks if a user owns a specific zone by ID.

methods.name: zone_is_attackable
methods.description: Determines if a zone can be attacked by a user, based on zone ownership.

methods.name: is_authenticated
methods.description: Verifies if the current session is authenticated.

calls: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM zones WHERE id = zone_id AND owner_id = user_id)
SELECT owner_id INTO zone_owner FROM zones WHERE id = zone_id
